document_data.name: Valantha Moonbreeze
document_data.mainbody: '''Valantha Moonbreeze''' ({{Pronounce|vah|LAHN|thuh}}{{Cite adventurers league/The Malady of Elventree|31}}) was a merchant in [[Elventree]] during the late 1480s DR.
document_data.History: Valantha sold finger foods at a celebration for [[Mielikki]] at the [[Hall of the Unicorn]] in [[Elventree]].
document_data.Personality: Valantha had a terrible sense of humor. However, she often only asked for a joke or a funny story as payment.
